post:
Hello LET :)

Grab yourself a crazy bargain on selected OpenVZ and Xen plan's on our last remaining stock...

Since the beginning of 2011 we have been providing virtual private servers to the world, its our specialty. We now host over 300 virtual servers across four premium data centers in Europe and the USA and that number is constantly growing. With a range of different virtualization types to meet even the most demanding requirements, join us on our mission for virtual excellence.

**Datacenter & Network Info**
UK - Rackstation - Hampshire
DE - Equinix DC - Dusseldorf
US - Whole Sale Internet - Kansas City

(Test IPs are available, just drop me a PM or email sales@vmport.com)
